attributes.action: Re-assess the competancy of the people that set the budgets for the NHS.
attributes.background:
Every year every NHS Trust is forced to make decisions because they have run over budget. For every trust to face the same problem every year, to me suggests that the problem of overspending lies not with the trusts' board but with those that set the budget. 
I would like their system reviewed.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
